transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Crée un mappage explicite pour chaque colonne dérivée

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EXtractionSAP
source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReferentielAtc4
MapDrifted1 filter({ATC Client}!="#") ~> FiltreATCClient
ReferentielAtc4 aggregate(groupBy(ATC),
	Right_DR = max(Right_DR)) ~> UniqueATC
FiltreATCClient, UniqueATC join({ATC Client} == ATC,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JointureATC
JointureATC select(mapColumn(
		SalesAgentID = {ATC Client},
		ClientID = Client,
		SalesOrgID = {Org. commerciale},
		SalesChannelID = {Canal distribution},
		SalesOfficeID = Right_DR,
		BusinessUnitID = {Secteur d'activité},
		Dept = {Dép},
		Ville = {Localité},
		NoNiv1 = {Niveau 1},
		NoNiv2 = {Niveau 2},
		NoNiv3 = {Niveau 3},
		NoNiv4 = {Niveau 4},
		Niv1 = {_c4},
		NoGrpC = {Groupe de clients},
		Niv2 = {_c28},
		{_c30},
		GrpCli5 = {_c26},
		Partner = {Récept. de march.},
		NomCli = {_c10},
		NoCli = Client
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
EXtractionSAP derive({_c2} = toString(byName('_c2')),
		{_c4} = toString(byName('_c4')),
		{_c6} = toString(byName('_c6')),
		{_c8} = toString(byName('_c8')),
		{_c10} = toString(byName('_c10')),
		{_c18} = toString(byName('_c18')),
		{_c22} = toString(byName('_c22')),
		{_c24} = toString(byName('_c24')),
		{_c26} = toString(byName('_c26')),
		{_c28} = toString(byName('_c28')),
		{_c30} = toString(byName('_c30')),
		{_c32} = toString(byName('_c32')),
		{_c34} = toString(byName('_c34')),
		{_c36} = toString(byName('_c36')),
		{_c39} = toString(byName('_c39')),
		{_c41} = toString(byName('_c41')),
		{_c43} = toString(byName('_c43'))) ~> MapDrifted1
Select sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SortieNomenclatureCLient.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortieNomenclatureClient
JointureATC sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{affecte/non_affecte;plateforme/vente directe;origine de la ligne;year;month;Code client livr�;code client plateforme livree;code produit;quantite;ca;Code postal du client livr�;marque;ID marque;ID canal de distribution;Nom du canal;Diffus/Chantier;document_vente (vente directe);Agence commerciale corrig� (vente directe);Donneur d'ordre (vente directe);Facture (vente directe);Type poste Facture (vente directe);Num�ro offre;ATC Corrig� (vente directe);ATC offre;ATC livr�;ATC Performance;NomATC;Matricule;Motif commande (vente directe);Type de facture (vente directe);N1groupe;N2groupe;N3groupe;N4groupe;N5groupe;N6groupe;N7groupe;N1groupedesignation;N2groupedesignation;N3groupedesignation;N4groupedesignation;N5groupedesignation;N6groupedesignation;N7groupedesignation;N1localedesignation;N2localedesignation;N3localedesignation;N4localedesignation;N5localedesignation;N6localedesignation;N7localedesignation;N1locale;N2locale;N3locale;N4locale;N5locale;N6locale;N7locale;Hi�rarchgroupe;Hi�rarchlocale;Num�ro du compte;EPS_Nom du compte;EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie g�n�rale;EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie d�taill�e;EPS_Compte principal: Num�ro du compte;EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte;Client;Num�ro client indirect;CODE_CMI;NOM_CMI;Nom du compte;Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie g�n�rale;Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie d�taill�e;Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Num�ro du compte;Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinktemp
